mapper.insert: insert into TB_CHATBOT_HIST (bot_content, bot_type, bot_sess_id, bot_dt) values (#{botContent}, #{botType}, #{botSessId}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT bot_no, bot_content, bot_type, bot_dt, bot_sess_id FROM TB_CHATBOT_HIST WHERE bot_sess_id = #{sessId} ORDER BY bot_no ASC
SELECT bot_no, bot_content, bot_type, bot_dt FROM TB_CHATBOT_HIST ORDER BY bot_no DESC fetch first 30 rows ONLY
